text: Even the bone cuff-links found beside the body, which had at first been considered as belonging to the killer, proved yet another red herring, for it was learned that they had been borrowed by Elizabeth Camp from one of her sisters. A young man from Reading named Marshall had an uncomfortable time in the presence of the coroner.
handwritten_text: Even the bone cuff-links found beside the body, which had at first been considered as belonging to the killer, proved yet another red herring, for it was learned that they had been borrowed by Elizabeth Camp from one of her sisters. A young man from Reading named Marshall had an uncomfortable time in the presence of the coroner.
